titleInfo.title: Tennessee by Drew Holcomb and the Neighbors

mods.abstract: Three color window card (pink, blue and brown on light yellow) featuring lyrics to the song "Tennessee"by Drew Holcomb and the Neighbors, which reads, "I was born here and raised here and I'll make my grave here it's home." This poster was reprinted in 2016. Posters printed after the original edition are known as "restrikes."

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
